keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour has helped 170,000 small businesses through the recession by allowing them to defer tax payments.
Labour has taken 1/2 million children out of poverty in the UK and is creating Sure Start Centres for every community.
Labour has provided 89,000 more nurses and 44,000 more doctors. The NHS now has the shortest waiting lists ever.
Labour has brought in free bus passes, winter fuel payments and will bring in free personal care at home for those pensioners with the highest needs.
